name: Key Twister
description:
Press and hold the keys on your keyboard as prompted on the screen. Don't let go until it's time to release one letter to press another. Listen to the beat, or look at the DJ booth ticker, to know how much time you have to move a finger to the new key -- your DJ's beat will build as you successfully twist around your keyboard.

English keyboard only,  press enter to Play/Restart when prompted or ESC to quit.

Made by Nick, Natalie & Erin. 2021.

Additional credit to Freesound.org, 04 & Dharma Type.
